MAINLAND CHINESE FOREIGN MINISTER QIAN QICHEN HIGHLY SKEPTICAL TOKYO 'S EXPLANATIONS CONTENT NEWLY PUBLISHED US-JAPAN GUIDELINES DEFENSE COOPERATION MET MONDAY BEIJING REPRESENTATIVES JAPAN 'S PRESS
QIAN ALSO SAID TIME RIPE YET TRILATERAL OFFICIAL DIALOGUE AMONG WASHINGTON BEIJING TOKYO DEFENSE ADDING `` SCHOLARLY DISCUSSION '' WOULD APPROPRIATE PRESENT
QIAN 'S REMARKS INDICATE DESPITE EXPLANATIONS NEW GUIDELINES JAPANESE PRIME MINISTER RYUTARO HASHIMOTO FOREIGN MINISTER KEIZO OBUCHI BEIJING STILL WORRIED WHETHER TAIWAN FALLS WITHIN SPHERE BILATERAL DEFENSE AGREEMENT
ACCORDING REPORTS JAPANESE MEDIA AMONG QIAN 'S CONCERNS -- DEFENSE PACT MATTER WASHINGTON TOKYO UNNECESSARY RENEW HENCE PUTTING CONTENT DOUBT
-- ALTHOUGH NEW GUIDELINES SPECIFICALLY MENTION GEOGRAPHIC CRITERIA STILL SPECULATION COVER TAIWAN
-- ARGUED RAISING TRANSPARENCY BILATERAL AGREEMENT OTHERS ADVOCATE KEEPING AMBIGUOUS OPAQUE
AMERICAN CHAMBER COMMERCE AMCHAM TAIPEI WEDNESDAY APPEALED EARLY CONCLUSION TRADE CONSULTATIONS UNITED STATES REPUBLIC CHINA TERMS TAIWAN JOIN WORLD TRADE ORGANIZATION WTO
AMCHAM PRESIDENT JEFFREY R. WILLIAMS TOLD NEWS CONFERENCE AMCHAM MEMBERS HOPE BILATERAL ROC-US WTO TALKS CONCLUDED SOON POSSIBLE FACILITATE TAIWAN 'S ENTRY GENEVA-BASED WORLD TRADE REGULATORY BODY
ACCORDING WILLIAMS AMERICAN BUSINESS PEOPLE INTERESTS TAIWAN CONVINCED BENEFIT TAIWAN 'S WTO ACCESSION TAIWAN WOULD REQUIRED OPEN MARKET BETTER PROTECT INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY RIGHTS
WILLIAMS RETURNED `` DOORKNOCKING '' VISIT WASHINGTON D.C. HEAD 12-MEMBER AMCHAM DELEGATION SAID US EXECUTIVE BRANCH AGREED AMCHAM TAIWAN 'S WTO ACCESSION LINKED MAINLAND CHINA 'S MEMBERSHIP APPLICATION
`` AGREE TAIWAN 'S WTO ENTRY CONSIDERED COMPLETELY BASIS ECONOMIC CONDITIONS '' WILLIAMS SAID ADDING TAIWAN LIKELY CONCLUDE WTO-RELATED TRADE CONSULTATIONS UNITED STATES END BILATERAL WTO TALKS WASHINGTON BEIJING
STAY UNITED STATES AMCHAM DELEGATION MET MANY CLINTON ADMINISTRATION OFFICIALS CONGRESS MEMBERS EXCHANGE VIEWS WAYS HELP AMERICAN CORPORATIONS UPGRADE OVERSEAS COMPETITIVENESS
WILLIAMS SAID AMCHAM MISSION URGED VARIOUS US FEDERAL AGENCIES ALLOW SENIOR OFFICIALS MAKE FREQUENT VISITS TAIWAN HELP BOOST BILATERAL TRADE ECONOMIC COOPERATION MUTUAL BENEFITS
EVEN THOUGH CLINTON ADMINISTRATION BUSY PREPARING MAINLAND CHINESE PRESIDENT JIANG ZEMIN 'S PLANNED VISIT UNITED STATES LATE MONTH WILLIAMS SAID MANY FEDERAL GOVERNMENT OFFICIALS STILL SHOWED KEEN INTEREST LISTENING AMCHAM 'S SUGGESTIONS OPINIONS REINFORCING TAIPEI-WASHINGTON TRADE ECONOMIC TIES
AMCHAM 1997-98 TAIWAN WHITE PAPER FORMALLY UNVEILED NEWS CONFERENCE HELD WASHINGTON D.C. LAST THURSDAY WILLIAMS SAID ANNUAL REPORT MAINLY ANALYZED TAIWAN 'S CURRENT ECONOMIC INVESTMENT CLIMATE REFERENCE AMERICAN COMPANIES INTENDING INVEST TAIWAN ADDING WHITE PAPER AIMED CRITICIZING PARTY
WHITE PAPER SAID TAIWAN 'S RESTRICTIONS TRADE INVESTMENT ACROSS TAIWAN STRAIT HINDERED DEVELOPMENT INDUSTRIES ALSO DISCOURAGED MULTINATIONAL BUSINESS GROUPS SETTING FOOTHOLD ISLAND
CLAIMED ROC GOVERNMENT 'S MASTER PLAN DEVELOP TAIWAN ASIA-PACIFIC OPERATIONS CENTER WOULD REMAIN PIPE DREAM TAIWAN COMPANIES ALLOWED ENTER VAST MAINLAND MARKET DIRECTLY OBTAIN ACCESS RESOURCES
WILLIAMS SAID AMCHAM 'S ANALYSIS MADE PURELY COMMERCIAL VIEWPOINT ADDING AMCHAM MEMBERS BELIEVE TAIWAN MUST ESTABLISH DIRECT COMMUNICATIONS TRANSPORT LINKS MAINLAND CHINA TAIWAN-BASED COMPANIES MAKE SUCCESSFUL INROADS WORLD 'S LARGEST MARKET

ITALIAN GOVERNMENT PUT NEARLY US 180 MILLION SINCE 1975 DEVELOP QUIET BACKWATER FISHING PORT COMMERCIAL HARBOR

NOTED MANY SUPPORT WORKS LEFT UNFINISHED DUE BUDGET CONSTRAINTS HIGHWAYS VICINITY FOUR METERS WIDE NEARBY HINTERLAND REMAINING UNDEVELOPED BLANKETED WEEDS

LONG MAJOR STRIKE PROBLEM CHANCES PROJECT 'S SUCCESS GREAT SAID NOTING PORT GIOIA TAURO STRATEGICALLY POSITIONED FULL SUPPORT ITALIAN GOVERNMENT

ARIAS FAILED SPEAK SUPPORT TAIPEI 'S MEMBERSHIP UNITED NATIONS ADDRESSED UN GENERAL ASSEMBLY LAST FRIDAY

ASKED DECIDED MENTION TAIWAN SPEECH ARIAS SAID PANAMA ASSUMING CONTROL CANAL THEREFORE MUST REFRAIN TAKING POSITIONS ISSUES INTERNATIONAL CONFLICTS ACCORDANCE 1978 TREATY UNITED STATES GUARANTEES NEUTRALITY CANAL TRANSFER

`` PREMISE ENCOURAGE INTERACTION COOPERATION PEOPLE SIDES TAIWAN STRAIT ORDER OPEN NEW ERA CO-EXISTENCE PROSPERITY BENEFIT SIDES '' LEE SAID ADDRESS
ROC ECONOMIC AFFAIRS MINISTER WANG CHIH-KANG TUESDAY UNVEILED SIX MAJOR POLICY DIRECTIONS ALLOW TAIWAN 'S ECONOMY ACHIEVE BETTER PERFORMANCE
WANG OUTLINED NEW POLICIES MORNING PRESENTATION DELIVERED RULING KUOMINTANG 'S POLICY-MAKING CENTRAL STANDING COMMITTEE MEETING TAIPEI
REPORT ENTITLED `` BUILDING COMPETITIVE ADVANTAGE HEADING TOWARDS DEVELOPMENT ECONOMIC PEAK '' LISTED SIX MAJOR GOALS GOVERNMENT
GOALS INCLUDE CREATING FAVORABLE INVESTMENT ENVIRONMENT IMPROVING BASIC INFRASTRUCTURE DEVELOPING TECHNOLOGY-ORIENTED INDUSTRIES STRENGTHENING EXPANDING COUNTRY 'S SMALL- MEDIUM-SIZED ENTERPRISES SMES STRENGTHENING COMPETITIVENESS EXPORTS EXPANDING INTERNATIONAL COOPERATION
WANG SAID MEASURES ACHIEVE GOALS URGENTLY NEEDED ENSURE COUNTRY RETAIN ECONOMIC CLOUT ISLAND 'S ENTERPRISES MAINTAIN COMPETITIVENESS AMID GROWING GLOBAL COMPETITION
REPORT WANG SAID PAST YEARS TAIWAN 'S ECONOMY CLEARLY EMERGED DOLDRUMS RECESSION TAKE LEAD AMONG FOUR `` ASIAN DRAGON '' COUNTRIES TERMS ECONOMIC GROWTH
CONFIDENCE AMONG TAIWAN 'S INDUSTRIAL EXECUTIVES LARGELY RESTORED PRIVATE INVESTMENT VASTLY INCREASED PROVIDING DRIVING FORCE BEHIND TAIWAN 'S FUTURE ECONOMIC GROWTH WANG ADDED
PREDICTED COUNTRY 'S ANNUAL ECONOMIC GROWTH RATE EXCEED 6.58 PERCENT END YEAR BASED STABLE GROWTH INCREASED PRIVATE INVESTMENT ACTIVE COMMERCIAL INDUSTRIAL SECTORS
GROWTH ACHIEVED TAIWAN RANK SEVENTH WORLD TERMS ECONOMIC GROWTH HIGHEST POSITION SINCE 1992 WANG SAID
HOWEVER DESPITE OPTIMISTIC FORECAST MINISTER WARNED DOMESTIC INDUSTRIES NEED OVERCOME MANY INTERNAL EXTERNAL ENVIRONMENTAL CHALLENGES ORDER ACHIEVE METAMORPHOSIS ENABLE FACE GLOBAL COMPETITION
HIGHLY EFFICIENT INVESTMENT MECHANISM BETTER INVESTMENT ENVIRONMENT HIGH LEVEL INVESTMENT STANDARDS PROVIDED PART PROCESS
WANG DESCRIBED ACHIEVING OVERALL BOOST PRODUCTION COMPETITIVENESS `` IMPORTANT MISSION '' REFORMING COUNTRY 'S ECONOMIC SYSTEM ADDING SIGNIFICANT RESULTS STILL DEPEND UPON INCREASE CORPORATE INVESTMENT ECONOMIC GROWTH TECHNOLOGICAL PROGRESS
GAVE ASSURANCE MINISTRY ALSO WORK HELP INDUSTRIES CREATE BREAKTHROUGHS PRODUCTION INNOVATIONS ACTIVELY COUNSEL SMES HELP UPGRADE PRODUCTION BASES ENCOURAGE FIRMS ACTIVELY JUMP INTERNATIONAL MARKETS CAPITALIZE TAIWAN 'S ECONOMIC STRENGTH REVITALIZE GLOBAL MARKET
WANG SAID NEW POLICY DIRECTIONS DESIGNED MEET CURRENT DOMESTIC INTERNATIONAL ECONOMIC TRENDS TAIWAN 'S ECONOMY REACH NEW PEAK PERFORMANCE

ADDITION SHIPPING SERVICES GROUP ALSO CONTROLS EVA AIRWAYS FIRST COMPLETELY PRIVATE TAIWAN AIRLINE OPERATE INTERNATIONAL FLIGHTS VARIETY COMPANIES MANUFACTURING CONSTRUCTION FINANCIAL SERVICES INDUSTRIES

PEOPLE NEVER UNDERSTAND MUCH TIME SWEAT BLOOD MONEY CONTRIBUTED VENTURES ''

QIAO LONG SEEN JIANG 'S POLITICAL ENEMY
MEETING FORMER JAPANESE PRIME MINISTER NOBORU TAKESHITA BEIJING WEDNESDAY JIANG EXPLAINED QIAO 'S STEPPING DUE SOLELY ADVANCED AGE
ACCOMPANYING TAKESHITA MEETING DISCLOSED JAPANESE MEDIA ACCORDING JIANG 'S EXPLANATION NEW STIPULATION REGARDING COUNTING AGE PERSONS BORN MONTH JUNE COUNTED BORN FOLLOWING YEAR
THUS BORN AUGUST 1926 JIANG CONSIDERED 70 YEARS OLD RATHER 71 15TH NATIONAL CONGRESS CCP CONVENED SEPTEMBER
HENCE DEEMED EXCEEDED 70-YEAR-OLD AGE LIMITATION FORCED RETIREMENT OFFICIALS RULE ADOPTED CCP
QIAO SHI BORN DECEMBER 1924 COULD ALSO TAKE ADVANTAGE CONSIDERED ONE YEAR YOUNGER CLEARLY SURPASSED RETIREMENT AGE THUS QUESTION REGARDING STEPPING

CLOSE 15TH NATIONAL CONGRESS CHINESE COMMUNIST PARTY CCP SAW RETIREMENT PARTY 'S CENTRAL COMMITTEE VIRTUALLY PARTY VETERANS WHOSE POLITICAL CAREERS BEGAN 1949 STRAITS TIMES POINTED COMMENTARY FRIDAY
FIRST TIME HISTORY CCP DECISION-MAKING BODY COMPOSED MEMBERS BEGAN POLITICAL CAREERS SHORTLY 1949
DEVELOPMENT GREAT IMPLICATIONS MAINLAND CHINA ARTICLE SAID
YEAR 1949 COMMUNISTS TOOK CONTROL MAINLAND CHINA USED BENCHMARK DEMARCATE GENERATIONS
REVOLUTIONARIES LIKE MAO ZEDONG DENG XIAOPING CONSIDERED FIRST GENERATION
PEOPLE LIKE JIANG ZEMIN LI PENG JOINED PARTY PUBLIC SERVICE AROUND 1949 SECOND GENERATION BORN 1949 THIRD GENERATION
STUDIES FOUND BELONGING SECOND GENERATION SHARED COMMON CHARACTERISTICS
LACKED LEGENDARY REVOLUTIONARY EXPERIENCES MONUMENTAL ACHIEVEMENTS FIRST GENERATION BACK CLAIM POWER
ALSO LACKED CHARISMA FORCE CHARACTER CHARACTERIZING FIRST GENERATION
GROUP THEREFORE INCLINED TOWARD POWER-SHARING ARRANGEMENT WITHIN RULING CAUCUS
ALTHOUGH COLLECTIVE LEADERSHIP IDEAL FIRST GENERATION LEADERS NEVER ACTUALLY PUT PRACTICE STRONG CHARACTER MEMBERS
SECOND GENERATION STOOD BETTER CHANCE SUCCESS
WORKING SHADOW FIRST GENERATION LEADERS MEANT SECOND GENERATION MEMBERS LESS ROOM INNOVATE
COLLAPSE SOVIET UNION FORCED TAKE REFORMIST LINE
UNIVERSITY EDUCATION SECOND GENERATION LEADERS ALSO GOOD TECHNOCRATS
RATIONAL WILLING LISTEN DIFFERENT POINTS VIEW PREPARED MAKE GREATER USE THINK TANKS RUNNING ECONOMY
RESULTS 15TH PARTY CONGRESS SEEM CONFIRM OBSERVATIONS STRAITS TIMES SAID
PARTY CONGRESS SHOWED ELEMENT POWER-SHARING THOUGH HIGHEST LEVEL NOTED

JIANG MET US PRESIDENT BILL CLINTON SECOND TIME SEATTLE 1994 MADE CLEAR BEIJING 'S STANDPOINT TOWARD WASHINGTON `` INCREASING CONFIDENCE DECREASING TROUBLE DEVELOPING COOPERATION CONFRONTATION ''
JIANG 'S HOPE ABLE CONFIRM FOLLOWING FIVE PRINCIPLES BILATERAL RELATIONSHIP -- HANDLE RELATIONS BEIJING WASHINGTON EYE WORLD TRENDS 21ST CENTURY -- GET RID DIFFERENCES SOCIAL SYSTEMS IDEOLOGIES TWO SIDES TACKLE PROBLEMS GOODWILL -- TAKE ADVANTAGE ONE ANOTHER 'S CHARACTERISTICS PROMOTE ALL-ROUND ECONOMIC COOPERATION BASED EQUALITY MUTUAL BENEFIT -- COOPERATE PREVENTING ARMS PROLIFERATION PROMOTING ENVIRONMENTAL CONSERVATION CRACKING DRUGS TERRORISM -- ENHANCE MUTUAL VISITS HIGH-LEVEL CONTACTS
LAST MARCH RELATIONS BEIJING WASHINGTON THAWING GRADUALLY JIANG TOLD AL GORE US VICE PRESIDENT HIGHEST-RANKING US LEADER VISIT BEIJING DENG 'S DEATH TIANANMEN MASSACRE ORDER ENTER NEXT CENTURY SOUND STABLE PEACE THREE PRINCIPLES ADHERED FIRMLY -- CONSISTENTLY ADHERING PRINCIPLE MUTUAL INTERESTS STANDING HIGHER VIEWING FARTHER ACTING ACCORDANCE THREE JOINT COMMUNIQUES HANDLING TAIWAN PROBLEM PROPERLY
JIANG 'S INTERPRETATION PRINCIPLES WORTHY MUCH ATTENTION
FIRST PRINCIPLE JIANG TIME STRESSED `` MUTUAL INTERESTS '' INSTEAD `` COMMON ENEMY '' DONE PAST
SECOND PRINCIPLE SOUNDS RATHER EMPTY REALLY MEANS BEIJING MUST STICK POLICY REFORM OPENING-UP
THIRD PRINCIPLE SIGNIFICANCE TAIPEI EMPHASIZES LETTING TAIWAN PROBLEM AFFECT PROGRESS SINO-US BILATERAL RELATIONS
SEEMS JIANG 'S THREE PRINCIPLES RECEIVED POSITIVE RESPONSE WASHINGTON PROBABLY JIANG USED CHINESE IDIOM `` SKY CLEARS LONG RAIN '' DEPICT BILATERAL RELATIONS MET HOUSE SPEAKER NEWT GINGRICH TWO DAYS MEETING GORE
VIEWED HINDSIGHT DENG 'S FIVE PRINCIPLES 1994 SEEN FLEDGLING FORM JIANG 'S PATTERN PRESENT THREE PRINCIPLES REPRESENT COMPLETE EMERGENCE JIANG 'S PHILOSOPHY
JIANG TALKING THREE PRINCIPLES PRIOR MEETING US PRESIDENT BILL CLINTON INDICATING HOPING ACCEPTED WASHINGTON MERGED BILATERAL RELATIONSHIP
ACCORDING INFORMED SOURCES ALTHOUGH FOURTH COMMUNIQUE LIKELY SIGNED JIANG 'S VISIT STILL BEIJING 'S YEARNING CLINTON JIANG PRESENT COMMON STANCE WORLD LEAD NEW ERA MUTUAL INTERESTS BASIS

PROFESSOR HSU YU MILITARY-RUN FUHSINGKANG COLLEGE HOWEVER DISAGREED PAN 'S VIEWPOINTS SAYING NEXT SPRING EARLIEST POSSIBLE JUNCTURE RESUMPTION CROSS-STRAIT TALKS
HSU SAID ROC PRESIDENT LEE TENG-HUI EXPECTED SPEAK CROSS-STRAIT ISSUES NEW YEAR 'S MESSAGE MAINLAND PRESIDENT JIANG ALSO AIR VIEWS TOPIC MESSAGE RELEASED EVE CHINESE LUNAR NEW YEAR
`` TOP LEADERS TWO SIDES EXPRESSED OPINIONS AGENDA CROSS-STRAIT CONSULTATIONS RESUME '' HSU ASSERTED
SPEAKING OCCASION CHI-HUA NATIONAL CHENGCHI UNIVERSITY PROFESSOR SAID TAIPEI BEIJING NEGOTIATION CHOICE NECESSITY
`` BEIJING WOULD LIKE MAINTAIN COMPARATIVE STATE PEACE TAIWAN STRAIT AFRAID CROSS-STRAIT MILITARY CONFRONTATION WOULD AFFECT ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT IMPLEMENTATION ONE COUNTRY TWO SYSTEMS FORMULA HONG KONG MACAU '' ANALYZED
BACKGROUND SAID BEIJING WOULD DESIRE RESUMPTION TALKS TAIWAN REACH AGREEMENT CERTAIN CONTROVERSIAL ISSUES
`` MAINLAND CHINA 'S STANCE PREPARE WAR SEEKING PEACE
TAIWAN STANCE AVOIDANCE WAR NEGOTIATION '' SAID
TOUCHING POSSIBLE DEVELOPMENTS FUTURE CROSS-STRAIT POLITICAL TALKS PROFESSOR LIANG CHUNG-MING NAN HUA MANAGEMENT COLLEGE SAID TAIPEI BEIJING CONTINUE EXPRESS OPINIONS SHORT TERM

TAIWANESE STAR PITCHER KUO TAI-YUAN RETIRE JAPAN 'S SEIBU LIONS PROFESSIONAL BASEBALL TEAM END BASEBALL SEASON
KUO USED NICKNAMED `` EASTERN EXPRESS '' SPEED GAVE FAREWELL PITCHING SUNDAY MATCH DAIEI TEAM
EMOTIONAL KUO ACCOMPANINED WIFE CHANG CHUN-CHIH FORMER TELEVISION ACTRESS DAUGHTER BADE FAREWELL TENS THOUSANDS FANS END GAME
THOUGH SEIBU LOST DAIEI SUNDAY MATCH TEAM ALREADY CERTAIN WIN YEAR 'S CHAMPIONSHIP PACIFIC LEAGUE FRIDAY
VIE NATIONAL TITLE CENTRAL LEAGUE CHAMPION TEAM YAKULT STARTING OCT. 18
KUO 36 JOINED SEIBU 1985 REPRESENTING REPUBLIC CHINA TAIWAN MANY REGIONAL INTERNATIONAL BASEBALL CONTESTS
PLAYED LEADING ROLE HELPING ROC TEAM WIN BRONZE MEDAL 1984 LOS ANGELES OLYMPIC GAMES
NEARLY 13 YEARS SEIBU KUO RECORDED 117 WINS 68 LOSSES 18 RELIEFS
PERIOD SEIBU EIGHT PACIFIC LEAGUE CHAMPIONSHIPS
KUO SET MANY OUTSTANDING RECORDS PAST 13 YEARS INCLUDING PITCHING NO-HIT NO-RUN PERFECT MATCH 1985
ALSO MANY AWARDS INCLUDING PACIFIC LEAGUE MVP AWARD 1991
KUO DECIDED RETIRE AGE OLD WOUND RIGHT HAND AFFECTED PERFORMANCE PAST TWO SEASONS
KUO EARNED 1 BILLION JAPANESE YEN NT 260.3 MILLION STINT SEIBU
KUO WIFE SCHEDULED RETURN TAIWAN MID-NOVEMBER
EXPECTED CONTINUE BASEBALL CAREER RETURN HOMELAND
TAIWAN MAJOR LEAGUE ONE TAIWAN 'S TWO PROFESSIONAL BASEBALL LEAGUES REPORTEDLY INTENDS HIRE KUO OFFERING ANNUAL INCOME NT 10 MILLION
INCOME INCLUDE MONTHLY SALARY NT 500,000 PLUS ADVERTISEMENT REVENUES PRIZE MONEY
HOWEVER KUO SAID YET MAKE FINAL DECISION WHETHER JOIN TAIWAN MAJOR LEAGUE
ANOTHER TAIWANESE STAR PITCHER KUO YUAN-CHIH RETURNED TAIWAN LAST YEAR PITCHING JAPAN 'S CENTRAL LEAGUE CHUNICHI DRAGONS TEAM 20 YEARS DECIDED GO BACK JAPAN SERVE COACH NEXT YEAR

NUMBER LEGISLATORS PRESENT MEETING URGED EXECUTIVE BRANCH PRESENT VERSION ANTI-DOMESTIC VIOLENCE BILL LEGISLATURE FACILITATE DELIBERATION RELATED MEASURES

COMPANY MADE ANNOUNCEMENT FOREIGN WIRE SERVICE REPORTS SAID WEEKEND BACTERIA FOUND DREYER 'S COOKIES 'N CREAM BARS SOLD HONG KONG

DESPITE GLOBAL BAN IVORY TRADE ILLEGAL SMUGGLING RINGS STILL MANAGE SMUGGLE LARGE QUANTITIES ELEPHANT TUSKS AFRICA MAINLAND CHINA TAIWAN VIA SOUTHEAST ASIA HONG KONG PROCESSING COUNCIL SAID ADDING PROCESSED IVORIES SMUGGLED ABROAD ETHNIC CHINESE MAIN CUSTOMERS
ACCORDING COUNCIL IVORY PRODUCTS PROCESSED MAINLAND CHINA USUALLY SMUGGLED HONG KONG PROCESSED TAIWAN MOSTLY SHIPPED UNITED STATES
COA OFFICIALS SAID CHINESE-STYLE IVORY CARVINGS SCULPTURES PARTICULARLY DRAGON PHOENIX MOTIF CONSISTENTLY ENJOYED BRISK SALES OVERSEAS CHINESE COMMUNITIES
OFFICIALS SAID HOBBY COLLECTING IVORY PRODUCTS DECLINED TAIWAN SINCE GOVERNMENT AUTHORITIES INTENSIFIED EFFORTS CRACKDOWN ILLEGAL TRADE IVORY YEARS AGO
HOWEVER SAID ILLICIT IVORY PROCESSING CONTINUED EXIST TAIWAN
COA FIGURES SHOW IVORY OFTEN TOPPED LIST CONTRABAND WILDLIFE PRODUCTS CONFISCATED LOCAL LAW-ENFORCEMENT AUTHORITIES
TOTAL 173 VIOLATIONS WILDLIFE CONSERVATION LAW REPORTED JUNE SEPTEMBER YEAR IVORY-RELATED CASES FORMING LARGEST PORTION OFFICIALS SAID

OFFICIALS SAID SOUVENIR SHOPS LOCAL TOURIST HOTELS JEWELRY TRADING CENTERS DOWNTOWN TAIPEI FOUND ILLEGALLY DISPLAY IVORY PRODUCTS

THEREFORE SAID UNITED STATES TAKE ISSUE US FRIENDS ALLIES SELLING BEIJING MODERN TECHNOLOGY

DISCOVERY DETAILS PUBLISHED CURRENT ISSUE NATURE MAGAZINE MADE SCIENTISTS NATIONAL RESEARCH COUNCIL 'S INSTITUTE BIOLOGICAL SCIENCE IBS
RESEARCH INVOLVES GLUTAMATE ONE BRAIN 'S MAJOR NEUROTRANSMITTERS LARGELY RESPONSIBLE NUMBER COGNITIVE PROCESSES LEARNING MEMORY
DISORDERS STROKES EPILEPSY EXCESSIVE SECRETION GLUTAMATE RESULTS OVER-STIMULATION GLUTAMATE RECEPTORS
BELIEVED INITIATE CASCADE CELLULAR EVENTS CULMINATING DEATH NERVE CELLS
IBS RESEARCHERS FOCUSED GLUTAMATE RECEPTOR SUBTYPE CALLED AMPA
AMPA RECEPTOR ION CHANNEL CLOSELY ASSOCIATED NEURO-TRANSMISSION COGNITIVE PROCESSES BRAIN
ION CHANNELS PORES OUTER MEMBRANES NEURONS CONTROL FLOW IONS CELLS
ACTIVATION CRITICAL GENERATION NERVE IMPULSES
OVER-STIMULATION AMPA RECEPTORS ALSO LINKED NEURONAL DAMAGE DEATH ASSOCIATED STROKES
LONG ASSUMED FUNCTION AMPA RECEPTOR ION CHANNEL ACTIVITY
HOWEVER IBS RESEARCHERS IDENTIFIED NEW ROLE AMPA RECEPTOR BIND ACTIVATE CRUCIAL INTRACELLULAR SIGNALING PROTEIN CALLED G-PROTEIN
G-PROTEINS ACTIVATED KNOWN ONE CELLS IMPORTANT INTRACELLULAR MESSENGERS TRIGGERING VARIETY RESPONSES ULTIMATELY DICTATING CHANGES GENE EXPRESSION CELLULAR BEHAVIOR
WELL KNOWN ACTIVITY VARIOUS ION CHANNELS AFFECTED G-PROTEINS SCIENTISTS IBS FIRST PROVIDE EVIDENCE ION CHANNEL ACTIVATE MODULATE G-PROTEIN

STAND ATTENTION LIKE TEN SECONDS RESUME NORMAL ACTIVITIES
FAN KUANG-FU EX-NAVAL LIEUTENANT COMMANDER OPERATES TAIWAN 'S DISCIPLINED POULTRY FARM MOUNTAIN VILLAGE SHOUFENG EASTERN HUALIEN COUNTY 7,000-ODD CHICKENS OBEY WHISTLED COMMANDS ACCURATELY SEEM RECEIVED STRICT MILITARY TRAINING
FAN WHISTLES `` ONE SHORT NOTE '' MEANS `` ATTENTION '' CHICKENS STAND STILL 10 SECONDS WHISTLES `` TWO SHORT NOTES '' MEANS `` FALL '' POULTRY START APPROACH FEEDING STATION
HOWEVER CHICKENS START EAT `` THREE SHORT NOTES '' SOUNDS MEANS `` CHOW TIME ''
ASTOUNDING FAN 'S SUCCESS TRAINING `` CHICKEN CORPS '' DUBBED `` CHICKEN COMMANDER SHOUFENG '' LOCAL FARMERS ASSOCIATION SUNDAY
FAN RAN BUSINESS KAOHSIUNG RETIRING NAVY RETURNED HUALIEN COUNTY HOME VILLAGE RAISE CHICKENS BUSINESS FAILED
VENTURE ALSO FACED DEFEAT BEGINNING ONE-THIRD CHICKENS FAILED RETURN HOME ROOST NIGHT
STOCK CONTINUED PLUMMET DAILY BASIS EVEN THOUGH CRACKED VOCAL CORDS TRYING CALL HOME
FIRST BATCH 1,000 CHICKENS GONE WENT HUALIEN CITY BUY WHISTLE BEGAN PASSING MILITARY TRAINING CHICKENS
FAN SOON DISCOVERED CHICKENS WOULD LISTEN WHISTLE CHEERED CONSIDERABLY ALSO FOUND POULTRY WOULD `` LISTEN ORDERS '' UNLESS HUNGRY LEADING PERFECT TWO-AND-THREE NOTE COMMAND SYSTEM
TODAY FAN BUYS NEW BATCH CHICKS KNOW RULES WORRIED RUN
`` SMALL ONES LEARN QUICKLY LITTLE CHILDREN FOLLOW SENIORS N'T LONG LISTEN '' PROUD FAN SAYS

HUANG MADE STATEMENT ATTENDING JOINT FUNERAL SERVICE FIVE OFFICERS
`` TOP COMMANDER MUST ASSUME RESPONSIBILITY ACCIDENT MISHAP AIR FORCE
CA N'T OFFER RESIGN
'S AUTHORITY PRESIDENT CHIEF GENERAL STAFF ORDER QUIT
ASK SUPERIORS REPRIMAND '' HUANG TOLD PRESS
HUANG 'S REMARKS SEEN RESPONSE DEMANDS LAWMAKERS RESIGN TAKE RESPONSIBILITY SPATE TRAGIC MISHAPS INVOLVING AIR FORCE RECENT WEEKS INCLUDING CRASHES TWO F-5 JET FIGHTERS MOUNTAINOUS REGION EASTERN TAIWAN NEAR HUALIEN SEPT. 30
HUANG SAID MONDAY PRESENTED GEN
LO PEN-LI CHIEF GENERAL STAFF REPORT RECOMMENDING REPRIMAND C-130 CRASH ACCIDENTS BEFALLEN BRANCH SERVICE
HUANG SAID COULD AGREE VIEW HELD LAWMAKERS DEFENSE MINISTER CHIANG CHUNG-LING STEP ASSUME RESPONSIBILITY RECENT MILITARY MISHAPS
`` DEMAND UNREASONABLE UNJUSTIFIABLE '' CLAIMED ADDING MINISTER RESPONSIBLE FORMULATING MILITARY BUILDUP POLICY PLANNING
`` CHIANG 'S LEADERSHIP SECOND-GENERATION MILITARY BUILDUP PLAN COMPLETED AIR DEFENSE CAPABILITIES BEEFED
SEE REASON CHIANG QUIT MOMENT ''
HUANG SAID AIR FORCE CONDUCTING OVERALL REVIEW OPERATIONS MANAGEMENT TRAINING
`` SENT UNITED STATES FLIGHT RECORDER INSTALLED CRASHED C-130 TRANSPORT DECODING
DATA CONTAINED DEVICE AVAILABLE 'LL GIVE PUBLIC DETAILED REPORT CAUSE CRASH ''
AIR FORCE ALSO ASKED CHINA AIRLINES HELP DECODE VOICE RECORDER RECORDS CONVERSATIONS AIRCRAFT CABIN
`` DATA EXPECTED BECOME AVAILABLE WITHIN WEEK MAY ALSO HELP US DETERMINE CAUSE '' HUANG SAID
BASIS DATA AVAILABLE MOMENT SEVERAL FACTORS INCLUDING INADEQUATE TRAINING PILOT 'S FAILURE ABIDE FLIGHT REGULATIONS BAD WEATHER POSSIBLE ERRORS AIRCRAFT 'S INSTRUMENT PANEL MIGHT CONTRIBUTED CRASH
HUANG SAID CRITICAL QUESTIONS MAY CONCERN POTENTIAL DEFICIENCIES TRAINING PROCEDURES AIR FORCE 'S WING-LEVEL UNITS
HUANG SAID AIR FORCE GENERAL HEADQUARTERS DRAFTED PLAN DISCIPLINE WING-LEVEL UNITS ACCORDANCE MILITARY REGULATIONS
REPORT MADE PUBLIC APPROVED GENERAL STAFF HEADQUARTERS ADDED
WAKE INCIDENT HUANG SAID AIR FORCE EXAMINED OPERATIONS MANAGEMENT LEVELS
`` FOUND TRAINING JUNIOR PILOTS MUST REINFORCED '' HUANG SAID ADDING AIR FORCE DECIDED JUNIOR PILOTS MUST PASS STRINGENT QUALIFICATION TESTS ALLOWED FLY COUNTRY 'S NEWLY ACQUIRED SECOND-GENERATION WARPLANES
HUANG ADMITTED RECENT SERIES TRAGIC ACCIDENTS ADVERSE IMPACT AIR FORCE MORALE
`` PHENOMENON TEMPORARY EARNESTLY HOPE GENERAL PUBLIC GIVE SUPPORT ENCOURAGEMENT AIR FORCE STAFF ''
HUANG ALSO REFUTED SPECULATION OCCASIONAL MISHAP INVOLVING AIR FORCE COMBAT PLANES WOULD UNDERMINE TAIWAN 'S AIR DEFENSE CAPABILITIES
`` SPECULATION UNFOUNDED '' HUANG SAID ASSURING PUBLIC GRADUAL FULL DEPLOYMENT SECOND-GENERATION WARPLANES TAIWAN SUSTAIN CURRENT AIR SUPREMACY MAINLAND FIVE EIGHT YEARS

NONETHELESS COMMUNIST CHINA 'S WILLINGNESS LIBERALIZE STILL FALLS FAR SHORT NEEDED
JOINING WTO WITHOUT PLEDGING LOWER TRADE BARRIERS WOULD FRUSTRATE CENTRAL PURPOSE EXERCISE -- SPEEDING COUNTRY 'S INTEGRATION GLOBAL ECONOMY
COULD ALSO DEPRIVE COMMUNIST CHINA PRINCIPAL MEMBERSHIP BENEFIT GIVING UNITED STATES EU POLITICAL ARGUMENTS REFUSING GUARANTEE NON-DISCRIMINATORY TRADE TREATMENT ENTRY
STILL LARGER CONCERN CENTERS COMMUNIST CHINA 'S READINESS RESPECT WTO RULES
UNLESS LIBERALIZATION PLEDGES WORTHLESS MEMBERSHIP DISRUPTIVE
HOWEVER SINCERE BEIJING 'S COMMITMENTS CAPACITY DELIVER UNCLEAR
COMMUNIST CHINA 'S DOMESTIC MARKET FAR UNIFIED LEGAL SYSTEM RUDIMENTARY

PROBLEMS UNCERTAINTIES ARGUE KEEPING COMMUNIST CHINA WTO
BEIJING 'S FRUSTRATION TEMPT WALK AWAY TALKS
WOULD RISK SCARING FOREIGN INVESTORS COMMUNIST CHINA 'S GROWTH EXPORTS DEPEND FEARS ABANDONING ECONOMIC REFORM
RATHER CREATIVE APPROACH NEEDED FINANCIAL TIMES SAID
AIM CLEAR TIMETABLE PHASED OPENING COMMUNIST CHINA 'S MARKET WTO ENTRY
COMMUNIST CHINA MAKE AMBITIOUS LIBERALIZATION COMMITMENTS ALLOWED REASONABLE TIME ADJUST
ARRANGEMENT ENFORCEABLE WTO DISPUTES MECHANISM CARRYING THREAT TRADE RETALIATION BEIJING IGNORED OBLIGATIONS EUROPEAN ECONOMIC DAILY NEWSPAPER SAID

VAGNORIUS VISITED TAIWAN AUGUST 1992 SAID LITHUANIA TAIWAN ALREADY SIGNED AGREEMENT EXCHANGE COMMERCIAL OFFICES JULY 1991
`` HOPE ACCORD IMPLEMENTED SOON POSSIBLE FACILITATE BILATERAL TRADE INVESTMENT TOURIST EXCHANGES '' VAGNORIUS QUOTED SAYING INTERVIEW

DESCRIBING TAIWAN `` NEW OUTSTANDING STRONG '' COUNTRY VAGNORIUS SAID ADMIRES ACHIEVEMENTS ECONOMIC POLITICAL REFORMS ADDING LITHUANIA MUCH LEARN TAIWAN PARTICULARLY STRATEGIES ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT TRADE PROMOTION

`` TAIWAN ECONOMIC POWERHOUSE ALSO TAIWAN ASSIST MAINLAND CHINA POLITICAL DEMOCRATIZATION '' NOTED
LITHUANIA RECOGNIZES MAINLAND CHINA VAGNORIUS SAID COUNTRY WOULD WILLING HOST VISITS SENIOR ROC OFFICIALS PRESENT APPLICATIONS
ASKED WHETHER LIKELY VISIT TAIWAN VAGNORIUS SAID NEEDS TIME MAKE NECESSARY PREPARATIONS
`` LEAST MUST WAIT COUNTRY ADMITTED EUROPEAN UNION EU ''
VAGNORIUS SAID LITHUANIAN GOVERNMENT TAKE CONCRETE STEPS SHOW SINCERITY WELCOMING TAIWAN INVESTORS
`` HOPE WIN TAIWAN INVESTORS CONFIDENCE INVESTMENT CLIMATE ADMINISTRATIVE EFFICIENCY ''
VAGNORIUS SAID TAIWAN INVESTORS WELCOME BUY LARGE LITHUANIAN PRIVATE ENTERPRISES INVEST MAJOR INFRASTRUCTURE CONSTRUCTION PROJECTS
FACILITATE `` FREE ECONOMIC ZONE '' PROJECT LITHUANIA CONSTRUCTING AIRPORT SIAULIAI SEAPORT KLEIPEDA
`` TAIWAN INVESTORS WELCOME INVEST TWO PROJECTS ''
LITHUANIA ALSO OFFER PREFERENTIAL TAX INCENTIVES TAIWAN ENTREPRENEURS INTENDING INVEST FREE ECONOMIC ZONE VAGNORIUS SAID ADDING TAIWAN INVESTORS USE COUNTRY BRIDGEHEAD TAP MARKETS RUSSIA EU LITHUANIA SIGNED CONVENIENT EXPORT/IMPORT AGREEMENTS TWO ENTITIES

CHUN JOURNALIST 60 YEARS DIED PANCREATIC CANCER TAIPEI OCT. 6 AGE 81
DEATH PUBLISHER DIRECTOR NEWS MIRROR WEEKLY MAGAZINE DEVOTED JOURNALISM
LONG CAREER ALSO WORKED VARIOUS NEWSPAPERS INCLUDING CENTRAL DAILY NEWS CHINA TIMES CHINA DAILY NEWS TAIWAN SHIN WEN DAILY NEWS

ASKED

YANG YING-FENG TAIWAN-BORN SCULPTOR ACHIEVED INTERNATIONAL FAME ORIENTAL-FLAVOR MODERNISTIC SCULPTURES DIED LUNG AILMENT OCT. 21 BUDDHIST MONASTERY NORTHERN TAIWAN CITY HSINCHU
71
VERSATILE PROLIFIC ARTIST YANG LEFT BEHIND LARGE COLLECTION ARTWORKS RANGING BLOCKPRINTS BRONZE STONE SCULPTURES LANDSCAPES
GIFTED MAN BURNING THIRST KNOWLEDGE YANG NEVER HESITATED ATTEMPT NEW THINGS
ARTISTIC STYLE EVOLVED AGE SHIFTING REALISM ABSTRACT
LATTER STAGES CAREER YANG DEDICATED STAINLESS STEEL SCULPTURE
INJECTED LIFE VIGOR DULL STAID STAINLESS STEEL PLATES PRODUCT MODERN TECHNOLOGY
DAZZLING ARRAY STAINLESS STEEL SCULPTURES YANG CREATED PAST 20-ODD YEARS CLEARLY REFLECTS VIEWS UNIVERSE PURSUIT CONFORMITY HUMANITY PROVIDENCE
MASTER SCULPTOR STARTED CAREER CREATING BLOCKPRINTS FEATURING TAIWAN 'S RURAL LANDSCAPE LIFE
WORKS DATING MOSTLY 1951 EARLY 1960S REFLECTED DEEP FEELINGS NATIVE LAND
ADDITION PROJECTING REALISTIC IMAGES EARLY CREATIONS ALSO INFUSED ABSTRACT CONCEPTS
HSIEH LI-FA ART HISTORIAN DESCRIBED YANG 'S BLOCKPRINTS `` INCORPORATING DEEP INDIGENOUS CONSCIOUSNESS AVANT-GARDE ARTISTIC IDEAS ''
YANG BEGAN EXPERIMENT SCULPTURES DEPICTING HUMAN BODY RELIGIOUS THEMES 1954
FEMININE FIGURES REFLECTED ORIENTAL CONCEPTS BEAUTY TASTE
PERIOD YANG ALSO TOOK INSPIRATION BUDDHIST DEITIES CARVED GROTTOES YUNGANG CHINESE MAINLAND CREATE UNIQUE SERIES SCULPTURES RELIGIOUS MOTIF
BREAKTHROUGH CAME 1963 TRAVELED ITALY PURSUE HIGHER LEARNING
THEMES SUBJECTS SUBSEQUENT WORKS BECAME DELIBERATELY ABSTRACT LINEAR STYLIZED
YANG FOUND RESIDENCE SCENIC EASTERN TAIWAN CITY HUALIEN RETURN ITALY LATE 1960S
CREATIVE ENDEAVORS ALSO ENTERED NEW STAGE
BEGAN USE AXES CHOP WOOD STONES GRAND IMPRESSIVE SHAPES REPRESENTED BEAUTY GRANDEUR ALSO PHILOSOPHICAL OUTLOOK
YANG BECAME INTERNATIONALLY RENOWNED 1970 SHOWED WORLD MASSIVE STAINLESS STEEL SCULPTURE ENTITLED `` BLESSING PHOENIX ''
WORK FEATURING TRADITIONAL CHINESE THEME MODERNISTIC SCULPTING TECHNIQUES CONCEPTS MAJOR ATTRACTION 1970 OSAKA EXPO
RECEIVED RAVE REVIEWS ART CRITICS AROUND WORLD
YANG FOCUSED ENERGIES SCULPTURES USING STAINLESS STEEL MEDIUM
WORKS YANG CONVEYED CONCEPTS UNIVERSE NATURE HUMANITY BEAUTY WELL UNDERSTANDING BUDDHIST SCRIPTURE DOCTRINES
CONTINUED HUANG TSAI-LUNG CURATOR KAOHSIUNG MUSEUM FINE ARTS SAID YANG 'S STAINLESS STEEL SCULPTURES DESIGNED FORM INTEGRAL PART SURROUNDINGS RATHER OBJECTS VIEWED SOLELY DEMONSTRATE UNIQUE LINEAL BEAUTY IMBUED DEEP SENSITIVITY FEELING TASTE PHILOSOPHICAL THOUGHT
`` YANG 'S WORKS FULL CULTURAL DIVERSITY SYMBOLIC MEANING
ADDITION SHOWING QUALITIES MATURITY REFINEMENT WORKS PROVIDE RICH SOURCE INSPIRATION '' HUANG NOTED
YANG FIRST TAIWAN ARTIST EXPLORE ART STAINLESS STEEL SCULPTURE MANY WORKS INSTALLED OUTDOORS TAIWAN 'S MAJOR TOURIST RESORTS FRONT HIGH-RISE COMMERCIAL BUILDINGS
ONE STAINLESS STEEL WORKS -- `` EAST-WEST GATE '' CREATED 1973 PERMANENT DISPLAY NEW YORK 'S BUSTLING WALL STREET

LIN MADE REMARKS LEGISLATIVE YUAN PUBLIC HEARING IMPACT UPCOMING MEETING US PRESIDENT BILL CLINTON MAINLAND CHINESE PRESIDENT JIANG ZEMIN UPON CROSS-STRAIT RELATIONS

LIN DECLARED ROC HAPPY SEE US ENGAGEMENT MAINLAND CHINA SAYING COMMUNICATION HELPS PROMOTE UNDERSTANDING DEFUSE CONFRONTATION
SAID INTERACTION WASHINGTON BEIJING ALSO CONTRIBUTE OVERALL STABILITY ASIA PACIFIC REGION
WASHINGTON PROMISED INFORM TAIPEI ANYTHING ARISING CLINTON-JIANG MEETING RELATES TAIWAN LIN SAID ADDING HOWEVER UNITED STATES REPEATEDLY STATED INTENTION ACTING MEDIATOR TWO SIDES TAIWAN STRAIT
NEVERTHELESS LIN SAID WASHINGTON HOPING CROSS-STRAIT DIALOGUE RESUMED SOON ALTHOUGH INTERFERE TIMING FORM CONTENT TALKS
LIN SAID ROC HOPES BEIJING LEADERSHIP CONSOLIDATED POWER BASE COMMUNIST PARTY CONGRESS ACCEPT FACT SEPARATE RULE TWO SIDES TAIWAN STRAIT
LIN SAID TAIPEI BEIJING COULD PUT ASIDE DIFFERENCES ISSUE SOVEREIGNTY RESUME TALKS WITHOUT PRIOR CONDITIONS PRAGMATIC APPROACH WOULD CONTRIBUTE STABILITY TAIWAN STRAIT ALSO HELP PROMOTE CROSS-STRAIT ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT

SINCE SBA KNOWS HOWEVER WOULD IMPOSSIBLE BLOCK ACCESS PROLIFERATION PORNOGRAPHIC SITES NET FOCUS INSTEAD STOPPING PORNOGRAPHIC SITES CHILDREN REACH EASILY SAID SBA CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER LIM HOCK CHUAN THURSDAY
`` SBA ELIMINATE SITES CERTAINLY WAY APPROACH REGULATION INTERNET '' SAID
ESTIMATED ALMOST MILLION PORNOGRAPHIC SITES WORLD 25 MILLION PAGES DEVOTED SEXUAL CONTENT
GIVE LOCAL INTERNET INDUSTRY SURFERS CLEAR IDEA SBA CONSIDERS OBSCENE PORNOGRAPHIC AUTHORITY RELEASED SPECIFIC GUIDELINES INCLUDING LISTING SEVERAL FORMS SEXUAL PERVERSION NEW INTERNET CODE PRACTICE RELEASED THURSDAY
INSTANCE PORNOGRAPHIC CONTENT CLARIFIED INCLUDE MATERIAL DEPICTS NUDITY GENITALIA PEOPLE CLEARLY ENGAGED SEX `` MANNER CALCULATED TITILLATE ''
INCLUDE CONTENT `` INTRINSIC MEDICAL SCIENTIFIC ARTISTIC EDUCATIONAL VALUE ''
NEW CODE ALSO SPELLS CONSIDERS SEX CHILDREN
PREVIOUSLY PEDOPHILIA MENTIONED PASSING
NEW CODE DEFINED CONTENT SEXUAL ACTIVITY `` PERSON APPEARS 16 YEARS AGE ''
REVISED CODE ALSO ADDS THREE AREAS SEXUAL CONTENT LIST SEXUAL PERVERSIONS SEEN EARLIER VERSION INCEST BESTIALITY NECROPHILIA
SBA EMPLOYEES DEDICATED SNIFFING PORNOGRAPHIC SITES EIGHT STAFF MEMBERS ASIDE DUTIES ALSO SURF INTERNET REGULARLY LIM SAID ADDING OBJECTIONABLE SITES BASED COUNTRIES UNCOVERED LOCAL INTERNET SERVICE PROVIDERS WOULD ASKED FILTER OFFENDING SITES PUBLIC
100 SITES FAR BANNED
SITE HOSTED SINGAPORE OWNER SITE WOULD ASKED REMOVE PROHIBITED CONTENT
REFUSE RISK FINE SAID

11TH STRAIGHT MONTH COUNTRY 'S OVERALL ECONOMIC PERFORMANCE RECEIVED `` GREEN '' RATING CEPD-DESIGNED FIVE-COLOR SCALE STABLE GROWTH
COMPOSITE INDEX ECONOMIC PERFORMANCE RECEIVED SCORE 31 POINTS SEPTEMBER FIVE POINTS AUGUST SIGNALING ECONOMY CONTINUES GAIN MOMENTUM APPROACHING STATE `` HEATING '' SAID CEPD ECONOMIC RESEARCH DEPARTMENT DIRECTOR THOMAS YEH
CEPD USES FIVE-COLOR RATING SYSTEM EMASURE COUNTRY 'S MONTHLY ECONOMIC PERFORMANCE
RED LIGHT MEANS ECONOMY OVERHEATED YELLOW-RED LIGHT INDICATES ECONOMY HEATING GREEN LIGHT REFLECTS STEADY GROWTH YELLOW-BLUE RATING SIGNALS ECONOMIC SLOWDOWN BLUE LIGHT REPRESENTS ECONOMIC RECESSION
RATINGS DETERMINED ACCORDING NINE MAJOR ECONOMIC INDICATORS EXPORT VALUE NEW EXPORT ORDERS INDUSTRIAL PRODUCTION MANUFACTURING INVENTORIES TOTAL EMPLOYMENT OUTSIDE AGRICULTURAL SECTOR MONEY SUPPLY STOCK PRICES CHECK DEFAULT RATE BANK LENDING PRIVATE SECTOR

RECENT CHANGES DIPLOMATIC GUIDELINES READ BEIJING WASHINGTON AIM `` INCREASING MUTUAL TRUST DIMINISHING TROUBLE PROMOTING COOPERATION PREVENTING CONFRONTATIONS ''
PRINCIPLE `` INCREASING MUTUAL TRUST DIMINISHING TROUBLE '' APPEARED FIRST SPEECH DENG XIAOPING LATE PARAMOUNT LEADER MAINLAND CHINA BEIJING-WASHINGTON RELATIONSHIP TIENANMEN SQUARE MASSACRE 1989 JIANG ADDED `` PROMOTING COOPERATION PREVENTING CONFRONTATIONS '' SEVERAL YEARS LATER
COMBINATION TWO FORMED BEIJING 'S DIPLOMATIC GUIDELINES TOWARD WASHINGTON
JIANG MET SAMUEL R. BERGER ASSISTANT US PRESIDENT NATIONAL SECURITY AFFAIRS AUG. 13 HOWEVER N'T REPEAT DIPLOMATIC PRINCIPLE INSTEAD SAID TWO SIDES `` EXPAND COMMON GROUND ENHANCE TRUST DIMINISH DIFFERENCES JOIN HANDS CREATE FUTURE ''
DIFFERENCES WORDING PLAIN
NEGATIVE WORDS `` TROUBLE '' `` CONFRONTATIONS '' REPLACED POSITIVE TERMS LIKE `` TRUST '' `` CREATE FUTURE ''
FINAL PHRASE ESPECIALLY INDICATIVE JIANG LONG PREPARING VISIT KEEPING EYE LONG-TERM BILATERAL RELATIONS BEIJING WASHINGTON

URGED GOVERNMENT MAKE OVERALL REVIEW COUNTRY 'S DEVELOPMENT POLICY PREVENT PRAGMATIC DIPLOMACY INITIATIVES HINDERING CROSS-STRAIT RAPPROCHEMENT
COMMENTING CALL RESUMPTION TALKS TWO SIDES TAIWAN STRAIT ISSUED UPON CONCLUSION WEEK 'S CLINTON-JIANG SUMMIT ROC FOREIGN AFFAIRS MINISTER JASON HU EXPRESSED HOPE FRIDAY DIALOGUE RESUMED `` SOONER BETTER ''

THREE KILLED SINGLE BULLET HEAD SEMEN FOUND CHENG 'S BODY SUGGESTED ALSO RAPED MOLESTED KILLED
ALTHOUGH MOTIVE YET ESTABLISHED SUSPECT APPREHENDED CASE THUS FAR POLICE OPINION WORK CHEN ACCOMPLICE PAI KIDNAPPING KAO TIEN-MING
ONE THEORY POSTULATES TWO FUGITIVES PRESSURE MONTHS HIDING FORCED DR. FANG ALTER APPEARANCES SURGERY ESCAPE POLICE DRAGNET KILLING FANG TWO CLINIC IMMEDIATELY AFTERWARDS
ALTHOUGH POLICE ABLE COLLECT NUMBER BLOOD SAMPLES CRIME SCENE UNABLE ASCERTAIN BELONGED EITHER TWO SUSPECTS
POLICE THEREFORE ALSO TOOK BLOOD SAMPLES CHEN 'S THREE-YEAR-OLD SON OBTAINED HOSPITAL TREATED CHILD AUGUST

DPP ENJOYING MAJORITY SUPPORT PEOPLE MAINLAND CHINA REVIEW NEGOTIATION TACTICS ASSERTS
SINCE EARLY 1980S `` UNITED FRONT '' TACTICS TOWARDS TAIWAN ALWAYS BASED SEPARATION RULING RULED BEIJING ASSUMES CONFLICTING INTERESTS

OUTER MONGOLIA PART CHINESE TERRITORY 1911 SEIZED UPON CHAOS CHINESE REVOLUTION DECLARED INDEPENDENCE BACKING RUSSIA

ACCORDING ROC 'S DEFENSE REGULATIONS OFFICER SAID NAVY WOULD IMMEDIATETLY COPE SUBMARINE INTRUDES WATERS EAST MEDIAN LINE TAIWAN STRAIT WOULD NECESSARILY ISSUE NEWS RELEASE EVENTS

REGARDING MEANING `` FORMAL RESPONSE '' TANG SAID REFERRING JIANG 'S STANDING EIGHT-POINT PROPOSAL SUGGESTED `` NEGOTIATIONS FIRST STEP FORMALLY PUTTING END HOSTILITIES ONE-CHINA PRINCIPLE TWO SIDES SHOULDER RESPONSIBILITY SAFEGUARDING CHINESE SOVEREIGNTY TERRITORIAL INTEGRITY WORK PLANS FUTURE DEVELOPMENT CROSS-STRAIT TIES ''

HUMAN HEART BECAME SIGNIFICANTLY LESS MYSTERIOUS TUESDAY CANADIAN CHINESE RESEARCHERS PUBLISHED 80-TO-90 PERCENT COMPLETE CATALOGUE GENES CONTAINED CARDIOVASCULAR SYSTEM GLOBE MAIL REPORTED WEDNESDAY
ROUGHLY 9,000 GENES NEVER DESCRIBED ORGAN -- SIGNIFICANT ADDITION SCIENTISTS BELIEVE 75,000 100,000 GENES REGULATE HUMAN BODY 'S DEVELOPMENT FUNCTIONS DAILY SAID
TERMS LONG-TERM MEDICAL SIGNIFICANCE AMERICAN SCIENTISTS SAY WORK `` MILESTONE DEVELOPMENT NEW SCIENCE CALLED MOLECULAR CARDIOLOGY '' ACCORDING REPORT
COMPANION PIECE MAIN THESIS STATES `` ESSENCE ALTHOUGH DATABASE PRESENTED US ADVANTAGES DICTIONARY MOLECULES SCIENTIFIC ASPIRATIONS USE CREATE GREAT NOVELS I.E. USE MOLECULES ANSWER CRITICAL PROBLEMS CARDIO-VASCULAR BIOLOGY MEDICINE ''
REPORT SAID RESEARCHERS `` USED DATABASE PINPOINT 100 GENES INITIAL SURVEYS SUGGEST INVOLVED CONGESTIVE HEART FAILURE ''

HOWEVER SAID QUESTIONABLE WHETHER HONG KONG ABLE MAINTAIN STATUS QUO LONGER TERM ADDING MAY TAKE THREE FIVE YEARS ANSWER

SAID INDICATION EVEN VETERAN OBSERVERS HONG KONG AFFAIRS CONFIDENCE BEIJING 'S ADMINISTRATIVE FORMULA

CEPD USES FIVE-COLOR RATING SYSTEM MEASURE COUNTRY 'S MONTHLY ECONOMIC PERFORMANCE
RED LIGHT MEANS ECONOMY OVERHEATED YELLOW-RED LIGHT INDICATES ECONOMY HEATING GREEN LIGHT REFLECTS STEADY GROWTH YELLOW-BLUE RATING SIGNALS ECONOMIC SLOWDOWN BLUE LIGHT REPRESENTS ECONOMIC RECESSION
RATINGS DETERMINED ACCORDING NINE MAJOR ECONOMIC INDICATORS EXPORT VALUE NEW EXPORT ORDERS INDUSTRIAL PRODUCTION MANUFACTURING INVENTORIES TOTAL EMPLOYMENT OUTSIDE AGRICULTURAL SECTOR MONEY SUPPLY STOCK PRICES CHECK DEFAULT RATE BANK LENDING PRIVATE SECTOR
MINUMUM SCORE HEALTHY `` GREEN '' RATING 23 POINTS
MONTH NOVEMBER NINE INDICATORS SHOWED MIXED PERFORMANCES
THREE INDICATORS -- NEW ORDERS EXPORT VALUE BANK LENDING PRIVATE SECTOR SHOWED MARKED IMPROVEMENT DRIVING OVERALL PERFORMANCE SCORE
RATINGS INDUSTRIAL OUTPUT STOCK PRICES CHECK DEFAULT RATE DECLINED REMAINING THREE INDICATORS REMAINED LEVELS PREVIOUS MONTH

MUST CONSOLIDATE FINANCIAL POLICIES MEASURES INCREASE DOMESTIC DEMAND DEDICATE EFFORTS TOWARD SUSTAINING THRIVING ECONOMY

MUST ALSO MAKE APPROPRIATE ADJUSTMENTS AGRICULTURAL SECTOR ACCESSION WORLD TRADE ORGANIZATION
THUS IMPROVE OVERALL ECONOMIC ENVIRONMENT STRENGTHEN ABILITY DEAL FUTURE CHALLENGES COMPETITION
SECOND MUST CULTIVATE SPIRIT DILIGENCE HONESTY
POORLY ENDOWED COUNTRY ACHIEVED ECONOMIC SUCCESS RELYING MAINLY STRENGTH HARDWORKING INDUSTRIOUS CHARACTER CITIZENS POSSESS
CHARACTER ALSO INCLUDES STRONG DETERMINATION ALWAYS TRY ONE 'S BEST WILLINGNESS BEAR HARDSHIPS PERSEVERANCE ONE 'S PURSUIT PREFERENCE SIMPLE LIFESTYLE
HOWEVER RISE ECONOMIC PROSPERITY AFFLUENCE PEOPLE ACCOMPANIED GRADUAL DETERIORATION SOCIAL VALUES
HEDONISM INDOLENCE EMERGED
TRENDS CONTINUE UNABATED ECONOMIC GROWTH WOULD JEOPARDIZED SEEDS SOCIAL MALAISE WOULD TAKE ROOT ADVERSELY AFFECTING NATIONAL STRENGTH COMPETITIVENESS
THEREFORE MUST EMBARK SPIRITUAL REFORMATION AWAKEN TRADITIONAL QUALITIES DILIGENCE HONESTY
MUST ALSO IMPLEMENT EDUCATIONAL REFORM ALLOW CITIZENS REESTABLISH HEALTHY SIMPLE POSITIVE OUTLOOK
SOCIETY SHINE VIGOR VITALITY FORGE AHEAD TOWARD GREATER PROGRESS
THIRD MUST FOSTER LAW-ABIDING SPIRIT
DEMOCRACY RULE LAW TWO SIDES COIN
DEMOCRACY DEVELOPED STRENGTHENING RULE LAW MUST FOLLOW
WAY GROUP HARMONY COEXIST RESPECT INDIVIDUAL 'S FREEDOM
DEMOCRACY PROCEED SMOOTHLY UNHINDERED PRODUCING FUNCTIONS VALUES COME NATURALLY
THEREFORE MUST CARRY JUDICIAL REFORMS UPHOLD SOCIAL JUSTICE COMBAT CRIME REMOVE DEFICIENCIES MAINTAIN SOCIAL STABILITY BUILD DEMOCRATIC ORDERLY CIVILIZED SOCIETY
FOURTH MUST ESTABLISH RESPONSIBLE EFFICIENT GOVERNMENT
ENTERED DEMOCRATIC ERA SOVEREIGN POWER RESIDES PEOPLE
ALSO PART PLURALISTIC RAPIDLY CHANGING SOCIETY
PEOPLE PLACED HIGHER EXPECTATIONS HEAVIER RESPONSIBILITIES GOVERNMENT
FOURTH CONSTITUTIONAL REFORM COMPLETED LAST YEAR SERVE BALANCE FUNCTIONING CENTRAL GOVERNMENT STREAMLINE STRUCTURE
ESTABLISH RESPONSIBLE EFFICIENT GOVERNMENT ONE CAPABLE MEETING NEEDS EXPECTATIONS PEOPLE
HENCEFORTH GOVERNMENTS LEVELS -- PARTICULAR LOCAL GOVERNMENTS MUST DEAL DIRECTLY PEOPLE 'S LIVELIHOOD WELFARE -- MUST ADMINISTER ACCORDANCE LAWS REGULATIONS MUST TAKE GREATER RESPONSIBILITY ACTIONS MUST DEVELOP NEW IDEAS MUST TAKE INITIATIVE IMPLEMENT NECESSARY REFORMS
WAY GOVERNMENT EXPAND ADMINISTRATIVE FUNCTIONS INCREASE SERVICES BUILD DEMOCRATIC GOVERNMENT TRULY `` PEOPLE ''

MUST PURSUE ECONOMIC PROGRESS EXPENSE CULTURAL DEVELOPMENT
PURSUING ABLE MAINTAIN BALANCE MATERIAL CIVILIZATION SPIRITUAL VALUES

RESULTED LACK PROFOUND CULTURAL REFINEMENT BROAD-MINDEDNESS SOCIETY TURN CAUSED ALIENATION AMONGST PEOPLE GROWING INTENSITY CONFLICTS

RENOWNED ECONOMIST ASSERTED PAPER ASIAN FINANCIAL CRISIS `` MAINLY BAD BANKING CONSEQUENCES ''
FAN ASIAN ECONOMIC MIRACLE ARGUED CONSISTENTLY REGION 'S GROWTH RATES WOULD SLOW EVENTUALLY DIMINISHING RETURNS SET ACCORDING LAWS ECONOMICS
HOWEVER EVEN ASTONISHED SPEED EXTENT CURRENT TURMOIL PREDICTED LONG-TERM SLOWDOWN
`` ACTUALLY SEEN SOMETHING COMPLEX DRASTIC COLLAPSES DOMESTIC ASSET MARKETS WIDESPREAD BANK FAILURES BANKRUPTCIES PART MANY FIRMS LOOKS LIKELY MUCH SEVERE REAL DOWNTURN EVEN NEGATIVE-MINDED ANTICIPATED '' QUOTED SAYING
SEVEN MONTHS SINCE CRISIS SPARKED DEVALUATION THAI BAHT LAST JULY REGIONAL CURRENCIES SHED HALF VALUES LOSING DECADE 'S ADVANCE US DOLLAR
ECONOMISTS USED TRADITIONAL `` TEXTBOOK '' THEORY BLAME PRESENT PROBLEMS POOR FUNDAMENTALS REGION 'S ECONOMIES
HOWEVER KRUGMAN REJECTED REASONING ECONOMIC FUNDAMENTALS NATIONS INVOLVED LARGELY SOUND REPORT SAID
GOVERNMENTS FISCAL BALANCE RESPONSIBLE CREDIT CREATION MONETARY POLICIES INFLATION UNEMPLOYMENT RATES LOW WROTE
ACCORDING TRADITIONAL ECONOMIC THEORY INVESTORS PULL CURRENCY BELIEVE LIKELY FALL DUE WEAK FUNDAMENTALS RESULTING SELF-FULFILLING CRISIS
INSTEAD KRUGMAN ARGUED WOES `` BROUGHT FINANCIAL EXCESS FINANCIAL COLLAPSE '' CURRENCY CRISIS `` SYMPTOM CAUSE ''
ROOT PROBLEM IMPLICIT GOVERNMENT GUARANTEE FINANCIAL BODIES ABSENCE ADEQUATE SUPERVISION CONTENDED
INSTANCE SAID THAI FINANCE COMPANIES GUARANTEED LIABILITIES RECENTLY
DECEMBER LAST YEAR THAILAND CLOSED 56 58 CRIPPLED FINANCE FIRMS ACCUMULATED US 16 BILLION BAD DEBTS PART CONDITIONS INTERNATIONAL MONETARY FUND-LED BAIL-OUT ECONOMY

SOUTH KOREAN BANK DEBT SAID KRUGMAN PROCESS TAKEN GOVERNMENT
POINTED GUARANTEES ASIAN FINANCIAL INSTITUTIONS ENCOURAGED UNDERTAKE EXCESSIVELY RISKY INVESTMENTS ENGAGE `` LOGIC MORAL HAZARD ''
MORAL HAZARD TERM USED ECONOMISTS DESCRIBE SITUATION DECISION MAKERS FULLY BEAR CONSEQUENCES DECISIONS
GIVES BANKS INCENTIVE `` PLAY GAME HEADS WIN TAILS TAXPAYER LOSES '' SAID KRUGMAN
SINCE DEPOSITS BACKED STATE UNDERREGULATION LITTLE ACCOUNTABILITY FINANCIAL INSTITUTIONS FEWER QUALMS OVERLENDING LENDING HIGH-RISK BORROWERS

DISCOVERY EXISTING FOSSIL RECORD SHOWED ALMOST ANIMAL PHYTA APPEARED WITHIN FIVE MILLION YEARS EARLY CAMBRIAN PERIOD 530 MILLION YEARS AGO
APPARENT SUDDEN EVOLUTIONARY GROWTH SPURT KNOWN `` CAMBRIAN EXPLOSION ''
DRAMATIC DIVERSIFICATION RELATIVELY SHORT TIME PUZZLED SCIENTISTS
MOLECULAR BIOLOGISTS ADVANCED IDEA PROCESS ACTUALLY BEGAN BILLION YEARS AGO PROCEEDED GRADUALLY
PROPONENTS THEORY HOWEVER LACKED SOLID EVIDENCE
LI CHEN 'S DISCOVERY PLANT TISSUES ANIMAL EMBRYOS ROCKS 580 MILLION YEARS HOWEVER SUPPLY IMPORTANT DATA TOWARD UNDERSTANDING MYSTERY EVOLUTION 'S `` BIG BANG ''
`` DISCOVERY OLDEST ANIMAL FOSSILS INCLUDING SPONGES VARIOUS KINDS ANIMAL EMBRYOS INDICATES PROBABLY VARIETIES ANIMALS BELONGING SEVERAL KNOWN PHYTA LIVED 40 MILLION 50 MILLION YEARS CAMBRIAN EXPLOSION '' LI SAID SCIENCE REPORT CO-AUTHORED
`` RESULTS SUGGEST EVOLUTION ANIMALS CONTINUATION PROCESS BEGAN LONG
FURTHERMORE PRESERVATION SUPERB DETAILS CELLULAR STRUCTURES STILL OBSERVED
MAY OPEN NEW WINDOW EXPLORING ANCIENT BIOMOLECULES '' SAID
LI TOLD CNA REPORTER CHEN 'S FINDINGS `` MAY LEAD SMASHING MYTH CAMBRIAN EXPLOSION ''

ASKED WHETHER NAVY DETECT ACTIVITY RUSSIAN-BUILT KILO-CLASS SUBMARINES PURCHASED MAINLAND CHINA OFFICIAL SAID 'S EASY MONITOR SUBMARINES HULLS MADE SPECIAL MATERIALS REDUCE NOISE

WINBOND ELECTRONICS CORP. ONE TAIWAN 'S LARGEST SEMICONDUCTOR MANUFACTURERS SAID WEDNESDAY BEGIN NEGOTIATIONS THURSDAY EMI GROUP PATENT INFRINGEMENT DISPUTE
DELAWARE-BASED AMERICAN AFFILIATE LONDON-BASED EMI GROUP NEITHER DENIED CONFIRMED WINBOND 'S STATEMENT EMI SPOKESMAN POINTED 'S UNCOMMON AMONG HIGH-TECHNOLOGY COMPANIES SETTLE PATENT RIGHT INFRINGEMENT DISPUTES COURT USUALLY TAKES MANY YEARS RESOLVE CASES COURT SYSTEM

COUNTRY PRODUCES 12,000 HIGHLY EDUCATED PERSONNEL ANNUALLY 20 PERCENT ENTER HIGH-TECH INDUSTRIES
